Implementation

Main Tools

Python is our main programming language.Python is a high level programming language with excellent readability

Django framework and its build in functions are used for developing our website. It follows model-views-templates design pattern

Bootstrap is a CSS framework containing HTML and CSS base design templates. It is used for front-end development.

SQLite is used as our embedded database.

Implementation overview


Authentication

Django

Database connection

Django ORM

Display timetable


1.Identify logged in user

We wrote a UserView class which is a base class for other View class to extend and utilise. The UserView class has fetch_details(self,request) function which automatically fetches username and firstname for logged in users.

2.Identify required Date

The timetable display current day by default. We used python standard library datetime module date.today()to get current date. We implementated a datetime picker using django widget library-django-bootstrap-datepicker-plus 4.0.0, jquery and django forms. User can select a particular date or select weekly view to get timetable for whole week. User input date are stored in form and recieved at View class.

3.Fetch data at View Class

At the View class we call get() function. we recieve data from user input form and set selected_date variable to user input. user object is identified by comparing username and logged in username. We then call generate_rota_appointments_ordered(selected_date,user) function. This function fetches all appointment objects and use django build in object.all().filter() method to get a list of all appointments belonging to logged in users and booked at selected date. Appointments that has been canceled are excluded. Now we have a list of appointment objects. Each appointment type has different time duration, the generate_day_rota() function matches appointment types and assign each appointment different amount of slots. It then generate dictionary with static time slot as key and its corresponding appointment object as value. The dictionary(rota) is then rendered and sent to templates.

4.Display using templates

Display patient/appointment list
